tp:treatment-sec.p:
Various surface and underground habitats on different bedrocks such as granite, limestone, basalt or flysh, 230–2300 m a.s.l., deciduous and coniferous forests, the dwarf
Pinus
zone above the timberline, alpine meadows and ridges with stony deposits and moraines; not in lowland or synanthropic habitats (
Tajovský et al 2014
).
